text: Shāyad tum kaho, ‘Ham Rab apne Ḳhudā par tawakkul karte haiṅ.’ Lekin yih kis tarah ho saktā hai? Hizqiyāh ne to us kī behurmatī kī hai. Kyoṅki us ne ūṅchī jaghoṅ ke mandiroṅ aur qurbāngāhoṅ ko ḍhā kar Yahūdāh aur Yarūshalam se kahā hai ki sirf Yarūshalam kī qurbāngāh ke sāmne parastish kareṅ.
